title: Breakingviews TV: The GE train
text:
Breakingviews TV: The GE train 10:44pm IST - 04:23
The conglomerate is offloading its subpar locomotive business by selling part of it to rival Wabtec and handing most of the rest to shareholders. It gets CEO John Flannery’s turnaround on track – and gives a hint to how he might shed other divisions. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
The conglomerate is offloading its subpar locomotive business by selling part of it to rival Wabtec and handing most of the rest to shareholders. It gets CEO John Flannery’s turnaround on track – and gives a hint to how he might shed other divisions.
